client.controllers

Class UserSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.controllers.UserSystem

  • public class UserSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    A Controller class responsible for providing functionality to Users.

      • createItemAndRequest

        public boolean createItemAndRequest(java.lang.String itemType,
                                    java.lang.String itemName,
                                    java.lang.String itemDescription)
        Requests to create and put an Item in ItemAvailable of the User currently using this system, with itemType, itemName, itemDescription. itemType, itemName, itemDescription must match the required format.
        Parameters:
        itemType - the type of the Item.
        itemName - the name of the Item.
        itemDescription - the description of the Item.
        Returns:
        true if the request is made successfully, false otherwise.

        Returns:

      • createMeeting

        public int createMeeting(int tradeId,
                         java.lang.String location,
                         java.lang.String timeStr)
        Creates meeting and add to meeting related of the Trade with tradeId, with location and timeStr. location and timeStr must match the required format.
        Parameters:
        tradeId - id of the Trade related to the Meeting.
        location - location of the Meeting
        timeStr - String formatted as time of the Meeting.
        Returns:
        1 if the meeting is successfully created. 2 if the creation failed because of invalid location. 3 if the creation failed because of time incorrectness, 4 if create meeting not successful for other reasons

      • editMeeting

        public int editMeeting(int tradeId,
                       java.lang.String location,
                       java.lang.String timeStr)
        Edits the current Meeting related to Trade with tradeId with location and timeStr. location and timeStr must match the required format.
        Parameters:
        tradeId - id of the Trade related to the Meeting.
        location - location of the Meeting
        timeStr - String formatted as time of the Meeting.
        Returns:
        if edit meeting successful, 2 if place is not formatted correctly, 3 if datetime is not formatted * correctly, 4 if edit meeting not successful for other reasons

      • confirmMeetingArrangement

        public boolean confirmMeetingArrangement(int tradeId)
        Confirms the arrangement of current Meeting related to Trade with tradeId.
        Parameters:
        tradeId - id of the Trade related to the Meeting.
        Returns:
        true if confirm arrangement of Meeting successfully, false otherwise.

        Returns:

      • getMeetingThreshold

        public int[] getMeetingThreshold()

        Returns:

      • requestTrade

        public boolean requestTrade(java.lang.String item2To1Str,
                            java.lang.String item1To2Str,
                            java.lang.String isPermanentStr)
        Requests a trade on behalf of the User currently using this system.
        Parameters:
        item1To2Str - item from initiator to responder. If this trade is a one-way trade, it is an empty String.
        item2To1Str - item from responder to initiator.
        isPermanentStr - "Permanent" if this trade is permanent trade, "Temporary" if this trade is temporary.
        Returns:
        true iff the trade is created successfully.

      • getTradeThresholds

        public int[] getTradeThresholds()
        Gets all trade thresholds in the system.
        Returns:
        an array of all trade thresholds get from userFacade.

        Returns:

      • agreeToTrade

        public int agreeToTrade(int tradeId)
        Accepts the Trade with tradeId on behalf of the User currently using this system.
        Parameters:
        tradeId - id of a Trade User wants to accept.
        Returns:
        0 agree to trade successfully, 1 fail because user is the initiator, 2 fail because trade is NOT_STARTED, other digit means unknown reason.

      • denyTrade

        public int denyTrade(int tradeId)
        Denies the Trade with tradeId on behalf of the User currently using this system.
        Parameters:
        tradeId - id of a Trade User wants to deny.
        Returns:
        true if deny the Trade successfully, false otherwise.

        Parameters:
        tradeId - tradeId of the Trade
        Returns:
        true iff the trade is NOT_STARTED.
